EmailTemplate.name: RE: Checking in (1382026257.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Checking in (1382026257.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Doug, Thank you for completing the online enrollment. The next step is sending me a copy of your completed I-9. You can find the I-9 form in your enrollment documents; you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I don’t need a hard copy.) I will also need you to send me a copy of your US passport (you can just take a picture with your phone and email that to me.) I also need you to log in to MBO Access <https://access.mbopartners.com/> and complete the “Industry Expertise” and “Disciplines” sections of your profile. This information needed for our workmen’s comp. policy and must be completed before I can activate your account and get you billing. Your user ID and password is the same as your MBO Business Center. I will be happy to review the agreements for you, please send them over when you have them. Please feel free to reach out to me with any addtional questions. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Doug Anderson [mailto:quilldogdea@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, October 16, 2013 7:15 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Checking in Sara,I’m just checking in. Is there anything else I need to do? Thanks for providing the info on rates. It will come in handy. I will have a few more items to inquire on including an agreement with one possibly two companies. Will you be able to review those?Doug
